hero.title: Experience the Symphony
hero.subtitle: A bold, modern philharmonic starter built with React + Tailwind. Data via Strapi soon.

home.heroSubtitle: Join our orchestra on a journey through timeless classics and modern masterpieces.
home.aboutText1: Founded with passion and precision, our orchestra unites musicians from diverse backgrounds.
home.aboutText2: From Beethoven to contemporary composers, we perform a repertoire that bridges tradition and innovation.
home.missionText: Bringing timeless classical music to modern audiences through passion, excellence, and innovation.

footer.description: Ansambli Muzikor Tetovë — a timeless ensemble dedicated to preserving cultural heritage through orchestral excellence and heartfelt performances.
footer.rights: Ansambli Muzikor Tetovë — All rights reserved.

about.title: About Our Orchestra
about.intro1: Our orchestra was founded in 1995 with a vision to bring classical music closer to the modern world. We’ve performed in over 20 countries, collaborating with world-renowned conductors and soloists.
about.intro2: Our mission is to foster a love of symphonic music through performances, education, and outreach.
about.missionText: To inspire, educate, and entertain audiences through the power of live orchestral music.
about.visionText: To become a global symbol of cultural excellence and musical innovation.

timeline.1995: Orchestra founded by Maestro Nikola Stojanov
timeline.2018: Awarded Best Symphony Ensemble in Europe
